name: The Forgotten Island - v1.0
description:
This is a very small open world RPG game. Player needs to find various ways to interact in the game. Through battles, you can increase your level and talent points. You must try to complete all the tasks to pass the level. Player can farm and fish. Can also eat and drink. Try to find your own way to enjoy the game.

How to play :
Press "W", "A", "S", "D" to walk around.
Press "1" to call the information and inventory interface.
Press "2" to call the mission list.
If there is anything you don’t understand, you can press "H" to call the help interface.
You can talk, fight and trade with NPCs.
Find or buy the equipments that make you stronger.
Upgrade your level and talents to complete the missions.

Fighting rules :
◆ Attack when your enemy relax.
◆ Defend when your enemy attack.
◆ Relax when your enemy defend.

P.S.
(1) More missions are included in the Premium version.
(2) Sorry, there is still no effective way to improve camera shake.

Best Regards,
Thomas
